languages.text: {n}Склонившись над трупом, Паскаль активирует бур на {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендрите{/g} и погружает его в месиво {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментаций{/g}, покрывающих череп херетека.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Склонившись над трупом, Паскаль активирует бур на {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендрите{/g} и погружает его в месиво {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментаций{/g}, покрывающих череп херетека.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal leans over the corpse, activates the sampling tool on one of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g}, and plunges it into the tangle of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} covering the heretek's skull.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは死体の方へ身を乗り出し、{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}のうちの一つの検体採取ツールを作動させると異端技術の頭蓋骨を覆う絡みあった{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}の中に入れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans over the corpse, activates the sampling tool on one of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g}, and plunges it into the tangle of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} covering the heretek's skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは死体の方へ身を乗り出し、{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}のうちの一つの検体採取ツールを作動させると異端技術の頭蓋骨を覆う絡みあった{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}の中に入れた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡俯身看着尸体，打开了{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}上的采样工具，将其插入了德曼兹头骨上的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans over the corpse, activates the sampling tool on one of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g}, and plunges it into the tangle of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} covering the heretek's skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡俯身看着尸体，打开了{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}上的采样工具，将其插入了德曼兹头骨上的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}中。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal beugt sich über die Leiche, aktiviert das Werkzeug zur Entnahme von Proben an einem seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} und führt es in die Ansammlung von {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} ein, die den Schädel des Häretekten bedecken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans over the corpse, activates the sampling tool on one of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g}, and plunges it into the tangle of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} covering the heretek's skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal beugt sich über die Leiche, aktiviert das Werkzeug zur Entnahme von Proben an einem seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} und führt es in die Ansammlung von {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} ein, die den Schädel des Häretekten bedecken.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se penche sur le corps et active l'outil d'échantillonnage intégré à l'une de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} avant de le plonger dans l'écheveau d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétiques{/g} qui recouvre le crâne de l'hérétek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans over the corpse, activates the sampling tool on one of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g}, and plunges it into the tangle of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} covering the heretek's skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se penche sur le corps et active l'outil d'échantillonnage intégré à l'une de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} avant de le plonger dans l'écheveau d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétiques{/g} qui recouvre le crâne de l'hérétek.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre el cadáver, activa la herramienta de muestreo que tiene en una de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendritas{/g} y la hunde en la maraña de {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}auméticos{/g} que cubren el cráneo del heretek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans over the corpse, activates the sampling tool on one of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g}, and plunges it into the tangle of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} covering the heretek's skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre el cadáver, activa la herramienta de muestreo que tiene en una de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendritas{/g} y la hunde en la maraña de {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}auméticos{/g} que cubren el cráneo del heretek.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal; cesede eğiliyor, {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentritlerinden{/g} birindeki örneklem alma gerecini çalıştırıyor ve tekâfirin kafasını kaplayan çetrefilli {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetiğin{/g} içine sokuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans over the corpse, activates the sampling tool on one of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g}, and plunges it into the tangle of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} covering the heretek's skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal cesede eğiliyor, {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentrit{/g}lerinden birindeki örneklem alma gerecini çalıştırıyor ve tekâfirin kafasını kaplayan çetrefilli {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetiğin{/g} içine sokuyor.{/n}
